question: During a recent plane journey, you sat next to a businessman who owns a chain of restaurants. You talked to him and he suggested that you should contact him about a possible job in one of his restaurants.Write a letter to this businessman. In your letterremind him when and where you mettell him what kind of job you are interested insay why you think you would be suitable for the job
text: My name is Ahmed Alrawi, and I am writing this letter to apply for the vacancy at your new branch on Rose street.

Being a businessman like yourself might make you forget about everyday conversation, however, I wanted to remind you that I was your companion on your flight to LA the last Monday. Actually, we first spoke at the airport for a moment, nevertheless, I figured you might not remember that.

Although I have an experience as a waiter,  I am applying for a chef job at the present time because this has been my passion since I was a toddler when I watched my mother cook. From that time, I used to love helping in the kitchen.

Alongside my mother’s teaching about food and cooking, documentaries and book improved my recognition of the types of food, in addition, they expanded my ideas about dishes and cuisines. Not only theoretically, moreover, but I had also been cooking since I was a teenager.
I hope you find this letter well.
